name: arqcashflow-docs-automation
description: Automated documentation generation and validation for ArqCashflow

scripts.docs:generate: npm run docs:api && npm run docs:schema
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:generate && cd .. && npm run build
scripts.docs:check: npm run docs:validate && npm run docs:build
scripts.docs:fresh: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:generate
scripts.docs:ci: npm run docs:generate && npm run docs:validate

author: ArqCashflow Team
